inputs.name: size
inputs.text: The size of the date picker controls.

inputs.name: maxDate
inputs.text: The latest date that can be displayed or selected.

inputs.name: minDate
inputs.text: The earliest date that can be displayed or selected.

inputs.name: startDate
inputs.text: The date to open calendar with.

api.name: DatepickerConfigService
api.usage: Should by injected, typically in the AppModule, to customize the values of its properties in order to provide alternate default values for the Datepicker.

variables.name: options
variables.text: A set of default options described below

variables.name: options.displayMonths
variables.text: The number of months to display

variables.name: options.firstDayOfWeek
variables.text: The first day of the week

variables.name: options.navigation
variables.text: Navigation type, select show selection boxes for month and navigation arrows, arrows show only navigation arrows and none hides the navigation

variables.name: options.outsideDays
variables.text: Days outside of the current month

variables.name: options.appendToBody
variables.text: Should the calender be appended to the body to display next to its toggle

variables.name: options.weekdays
variables.text: Should the week day names be shown

variables.name: options.showWeekNumbers
variables.text: Should the week numbers be shown

variables.name: options.icon
variables.text: The icon shown on the toggle
